mapper.sql: tthb_id, tthb_lbpm, tthb_bgxm_dm, tthb_bgqnr, tthb_bghnr, djxh, tthb_bgdjmxuuid, tthb_xgrq, tthb_sjtbsj, tthb_pzjgmc, tthb_pzwj, tthb_lrr_dm, tthb_lrrq, tthb_gluuid, tthb_xgr_dm, creatorid, createtime, updatorid, updatetime
mapper.insert: insert into t_tax_qybgxx (tthb_id, tthb_lbpm, tthb_bgxm_dm, tthb_bgqnr, tthb_bghnr, djxh, tthb_bgdjmxuuid, tthb_xgrq, tthb_sjtbsj, tthb_pzjgmc, tthb_pzwj, tthb_lrr_dm, tthb_lrrq, tthb_gluuid, tthb_xgr_dm, creatorid, createtime, updatorid, updatetime) values (#{id}, #{tthbLbpm}, #{tthbBgxmDm}, #{tthbBgqnr}, #{tthbBghnr}, #{djxh,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tthbBgdjmxuuid}, #{tthbXgrq}, #{tthbSjtbsj}, #{tthbPzjgmc}, #{tthbPzwj}, #{tthbLrrDm}, #{tthbLrrq}, #{tthbGluuid}, #{tthbXgrDm}, #{creatorid}, #{createtime}, #{updatorid}, #{updatetime})
mapper.update: update t_tax_qybgxx set tthb_lbpm = #{tthbLbpm}, tthb_bgxm_dm = #{tthbBgxmDm}, tthb_bgqnr = #{tthbBgqnr}, tthb_bghnr = #{tthbBghnr}, djxh = #{djxh,jdbcType=BIGINT}, tthb_bgdjmxuuid = #{tthbBgdjmxuuid}, tthb_xgrq = #{tthbXgrq}, tthb_sjtbsj = #{tthbSjtbsj}, tthb_pzjgmc = #{tthbPzjgmc}, tthb_pzwj = #{tthbPzwj}, tthb_lrr_dm = #{tthbLrrDm}, tthb_lrrq = #{tthbLrrq}, tthb_gluuid = #{tthbGluuid}, tthb_xgr_dm = #{tthbXgrDm}, creatorid = #{creatorid}, createtime = #{createtime}, updatorid = #{updatorid}, updatetime = now() where tthb_id = #{id}
